args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Front Passenger Air Bag May Not Deploy

Volkswagen Group of America, Inc. (Audi) is recalling certain 2022-2023 RS E-TRON GT and E-TRON GT vehicles.  The passenger occupant detection system (PODS) may experience a fault in the wiring and deactivate the front passenger air bag when the seat is occupied.A deactivated passenger air bag increases the risk of injury during a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 3773.0
